meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Fassola David Kleinman Mirza Gluhic Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7780.

td.p: John Fassola, an attorney from Homer Glen, Illinois
David Kleinman, a student from Sharon, Massachusetts
Mirza Gluhic, a transcriber from Toronto, Ontario, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,200)

tr.td: ITALY BEFORE THE ROMANS
POP CULTURE SQUIRRELS
THIS CATEGORY WILL BLOW YOU AWAY
STATE OF THE NEWSPAPER
SAILING LIT
TONGUE-TWISTER PROTAGONISTS
